name: 275,778,953,100 radiation cycles of cesium
description:
A game where you need to save your species from a robots who have enslaved them.

How to play:

Help the blue bots escape in less than 30 seconds
-Shoot at wall and jump to pull yourself up 
-Look for buttons to open the doors 
-Shoot red bots to stop them and the blue ones to boost them

this game was made for the  (Let's Create Game Jam #1) Game Jam
